title: WIPs and screenshots...
content: ...another forum I frequent has a rule concerning work-in-progress stuff: you must have come along far enough to be able to show screenshots of what you're doing. Seeing a fair few posts in here where there're people talking about what they're doing without showing anything, perhaps that could be adopted here?

title: Re: WIPs and screenshots...
content: The idea is good, but it wouldn't be nice to prevent people telling about their stuff. But however, if there are many topics about something and nothing to show, then it would be good.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: WIPs and screenshots...
content: I've seen this rule enforced at Pokecommunity.com, and they enforce it because there are always a kabillion people trying to post about their latest RPGMaker project that never gets finished. I think we're too small of a community for this sort of thing to be a real problem. So, no, I don't think this idea needs to be enforced here. Plus, from what I've seen, all it leads to is a bunch of retarded posts by people saying 'omg you neeed to post picture or this thred will be closed omg 0_o' and no real progress is made.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]
